About Game 
The Android company sent some spies to the Apple research center for stealing a new IOS upgrading plan. Hence, you got a job from Tim to find those spies and protect the new plan! 
After starting the game, you should find Android men (spy) by clicking those little blocks.Those Android men hide in those blocks. To win the game, you should find them all. 
After each clicking those blocks, you might find the target or get information about the number of spies on the row and column. 
However, your every scanning will be recorded. You should take the least scan and win the game.
